1.txt: I'm back with another food instructable:Mug Brownie made with Hot Chocolate mix!!!*Sorry about the pictures.

2.txt: I forgot to take a picture before I let my sister start eating it.
2.Complete: I forgot to take a picture before I let my sister start eating Mug Brownie.

3.txt: This recipe is pretty simple & it has no egg or cocoa powder.
3.Complete: This recipe is pretty simple & Mug Brownie has no egg or cocoa powder.

5.txt: Ingredients:- 6 tablespoons Hot Chocolate mix- 4 tablespoons

6.txt: All-Purpose flour- 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract- 2 tablespoons melted butter- 3 tablespoons waterMaterials:-

10.txt: Put the flour & Hot Chocolate mix into a mug and stir together well2.

11.txt: Add the melted butter, water, & vanilla extract to the mug and mix until you don't see any more dry mixture.
11.Co-reference: Add the melted butter, water, & vanilla extract to  it and mix until you don't see any more dry mixture.

12.txt:
(Should have consistency of brownie batter)
Put mug in microwave for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.
12.Co-reference: Put it in microwave for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.

13.txt: DO NOT MICROWAVE TOO LONG!!!Should be slightly moist in center.

14.txt: Add whip cream, ice cream or even both and enjoy!!!Again I am very sorry about the finished picture.
14.Complete: Add whip cream, ice cream or even both to mug and enjoy!!!Again I am very sorry about the finished picture.
